docs.snippet: LAKE SUCCESS, Jan. 20--The United States, acting alone, formally called on the United Nations today to find Communist China guilty of aggression in Korea and to consider urgently additional collective measures against the Peiping Governments.

docs.snippet: Cotton prices here were easier last week, but resumed their upward trend and reached new seasonal highs last Saturday. Net gains of 39 to 131 points were registered on the New York Cotton Exchange, following advances of 12 to 99 points in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Cotton prices here were easier last week, but resumed their upward trend and reached new seasonal highs last Saturday. Net gains of 39 to 131 points were registered on the New York Cotton Exchange, following advances of 12 to 99 points in the preceding week.

headline.main: UPSWING RESUMED BY COTTON MARKET; Weakness Early in Week Gives Way to Strength, New Seasonal Highs Being Reached

docs.snippet: Quiet prevailed in the foreign exchange market last week and with it came an improved tone in British sterling and the Canadian dollar. This was traceable to good buying by commercials, and the elimination of year-end requirements which had adversely...
docs.lead_paragraph: Quiet prevailed in the foreign exchange market last week and with it came an improved tone in British sterling and the Canadian dollar. This was traceable to good buying by commercials, and the elimination of year-end requirements which had adversely affected these units over the last month.
